description:
The versatile Chamlang FUTURELIGHT™ Pants are a true ''jack of all trades'' of performance outerwear. Articulated patterning delivers a comfortable fit with plenty of mobility and outer-leg vents to control your temperature during periods of high-output activity.

  • FUTURELIGHT™ waterproof technology uses nano-spun material to offer exceptional breathability and waterproofness
  • 3-layer construction with a durable nylon face fabric and DWR finish
  • Fully sealed seams and water-resistant zippers keep moisture from leaking in
  • Harness-compatible thigh pocket
  • Articulated patterning for dynamic moves in mountain environments
  • Zip-fly with a snap closure and integrated belt to get the fit just right
  • Leg vents lets you dump heat; the right vent extends up to the waistband for easy on and off
  • Reinforced kickpatches and internal cuffs protect against boots, crampons, and ski edges
  • Integrated gaiters keep snow out
  • Standard fit allows room for layering
name: The North Face Summit Chamlang FUTURELIGHT Pant - Women's
